marketing-text: Vhura sosi chikuva cheCOVID19 dhata. Yepamberi dhibhodhi ine browser kuwedzerwa uye yemahara yakatsanangurwa REST API, yakagadzirirwa mitauro yose.
name: Zita
promo-message: Yakagadzirwa nerudo ❤️ nechikwata chiri Hoobu.com. Ronga yako yepashure-dambudziko rwendo zvino ne yedu inotyisa chaiyo-nguva yekubatana rwendo kuronga
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Geza maoko ako kazhinji uye kwemasekondi makumi maviri uchishandisa sipo uye nemvura mushure mekuputira mhino, kukosora kana kutsvedza uye usati wadya kana kubata chikafu. Kushambadzira maoko chaiko ndiyo nzira inoshanda kwazvo yekuuraya hutachiona.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Regedza zvisingakoshe- misangano & nzendo uye tsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekukwazisa dzakadai sekukwazisana maoko, kugunun'una kana kutsvoda.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Maoko anogona kutora utachiona zviri nyore uye kamwe chete akasvibiswa, maoko anogona kuendesa hutachiona mumaziso ako, mumhino kana mumuromo. Kubva ipapo, hutachiona hunogona kupinda mumuviri wako ndokurwara.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Kuvhara muromo wako nemhino neruoko rwako rwakakotama kana kuti matani kana iwe uchinge uchitsokomora kana kutsvedza, uye kurasa tumisodzi hunoshandiswa ipapo.
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Kana iwe ukava nechiratidzo sezviratidzo unofanirwa kuzviparadzanisa seyedzo yekudzivirira uye kudzivirira njodzi yekuparadzira hutachiona nekugara pamba.
